{{Location Intro|description=<p>It is a coastal elevator and observation deck built on the side of a waterfall, similar to [[Romaritime Harbor]]. It serves as a vital trading port for Fontaine.<ref>NPC Dialogue: [[Cassigneul#Dialogue|Cassigneul]]</ref> The port handles a vast quantity of international trade, including tea and spices from [[Qiaoying Village]] and [[Sumeru]] respectively.<ref>NPC Dialogue: [[Kimpel#Dialogue|Kimpel]]</ref><ref>NPC Dialogue: [[Chourei#Dialogue|Chourei]]</ref></p>}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology=== 
*{{fr|Lumidouce}} is a portmanteau of the French words {{fr|lumière|light}} and {{fr|douce|sweet, mellow, soft.}}
